subject: 2/20 pt 2
body:
i’m thankful that jk told me about ingmar bergman loving “sex and the city”

i’m thankful for this spare and lovely tom petty song (

[https://open.spotify.com/track/5xIXisYiSN60TOr9udGTrL](https://open.spotify.com/track/5xIXisYiSN60TOr9udGTrL))
